panels.description: Sum of all validator balances.
panels.title: Total Validator Balance (Lyx)

panels.description: Total LYX return on the initial effective stake of active local validators.
panels.title: Total Earnings (LYX)

panels.description: Total percentage return on the initial effective stake of active local validators. Excess deposits will be reflected as earnings.
panels.title: Total Return

panels.description: Number of beacon nodes to which this node is connected.
panels.title: Peer Count

panels.description: The percentage of LYX balances expected to attest that are actually attesting.
panels.title: Participation Rate

panels.description: A metric expressing the distance between the current finalized epoch and the expected finalized epoch based on the genesis time. 100% means the expected and current finalized epochs are the same. The metric reaches 0% when the finalized epoch is 25 epochs behind the expected epoch.
panels.title: Network Liveness

panels.description: The percentage of LYX balances expected to attest that are actually attesting.
panels.title: Participation Rate

panels.description: Sum of all validator balances multiplied by the price of LYX in USD.
panels.title: Total Validator Balance (USD)

panels.description: Total earnings in USD.
panels.title: Total Earnings (USD)

panels.description: Price of Lyx in USD.
panels.title: Lyx Price (USD)

panels.description: Current maximum inactvity score across all validators.
panels.title: Max. Inactivity Score

panels.description: Current, justified, and finalized epochs. In this order, these three values should be sequentially decreasing.
panels.title: Epochs

panels.description: Current slot and head slot
panels.title: Slots

panels.description: Increase in all local validator balances over the last hour

targets.expr: sum(validator_balance{job="validator"}) - sum(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 1h != 0) - (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} > 16)) + (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 1h > 16))

panels.title: Hourly Earnings

panels.description: Increase in all local validator balances over the last day

targets.expr: sum(validator_balance{job="validator"}) - sum(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 1d != 0) - (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} > 16)) + (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 1d > 16))

panels.title: Daily Earnings

panels.description: Increase in all local validator balances over the last week

targets.expr: sum(validator_balance{job="validator"}) - sum(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 7d != 0) - (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} > 16)) + (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 7d > 16))

panels.title: Weekly Earnings

panels.description: Increase in all local validator balances over the last month

targets.expr: sum(validator_balance{job="validator"}) - sum(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 30d != 0) - (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} > 16)) + (32 * count(validator_balance{job="validator"} offset 30d > 16))

panels.title: Monthly Earnings

panels.description: Counts of active, slashed and exited validators.
panels.title: Validator Counts

panels.description: Number of pending and existing validators over time. Pending validators are shown as positive values, while exiting validators are shown as negative values.
panels.title: Validators

panels.description: Current number of pending and exiting validators
panels.title: Validator Queues

panels.description: Percentage increase in all local validator balances over the last hour
panels.title: Hourly Return, Annualized

panels.description: Percentage increase in all local validator balances over the last day
panels.title: Daily Return, Annualized

panels.description: Percentage increase in all local validator balances over the last week
panels.title: Weekly Return, Annualized

panels.description: Percentage increase in all local validator balances over the last month
panels.title: Monthly Return, Annualized

panels.description: Average validator balance across the network
panels.title: Avg. Balance

panels.description: Estimated length of time until all pending and exiting validators have cleared the queues.
panels.title: Queue Lengths

panels.description: validator stats by public key over the lifetime of the validator process
panels.title: Validator Process Stats

panels.description: The number of peers to which the beacon chain is connected
panels.title: Peers

panels.description: The length of time the beacon chain and validator processes have been running.
panels.title: Process Uptimes

panels.description: Average number of log messages received per hour over the selected time range
panels.title: Beacon Logs

panels.description: Versions of the currently running Prysm clients.
panels.title: Prysm Versions

panels.description: Average number of log messages received per hour over the selected time range
panels.title: Validator Logs

panels.description: Beacon chain and validator memory usage on the server.
panels.title: Client Memory Usage

panels.description: Processor usage on the server
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Network transmission (tx) and reception (rx) rates
panels.title: Network Traffic

panels.description: Memory usage on the server

targets.expr: ( node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_Buffers_bytes{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_SwapCached_bytes{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_Slab_bytes{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_PageTables_bytes{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_VmallocUsed_bytes{job="node_exporter"} ) or ( node_memory_MemTotal{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_MemFree{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_Buffers{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_Cached{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_SwapCached{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_Slab{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_PageTables{job="node_exporter"} - node_memory_VmallocUsed{job="node_exporter"} )

panels.title: Server Memory Usage

alert.message: Node or validator process is down for more than 1 minute
alert.name: Process down

alert.message: More than 50 slots behind than the chain
alert.name: NODE: 50 slots behind

targets.expr: sum(validator_balance) - sum(validator_balance offset 1h) - count(validator_balance > 16)*32 + count(validator_balance offset 1h > 0)*32
